counting or numbering (= giving something a number in a series): Evidence shows that numeration was developed amongst these peoples at this time. This language has a very complex system of numeration.
a system for counting or numbering things: In Roman numeration, X is 10, L is 50, C is 100, and M is 1,000. They numbered all the books beginning with 1 and ending with 99 and this numeration has now been adopted universally.
